message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $138.
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $132?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $132, Bob. But I'll meet you at $136. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $134?
I'm not willing to budge from my previous offer, Bob. I'll stick with $136. This is my last offer.
I understand that you're not willing to budge, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'll have to pass on this deal and consider other options.
